Name: Gremlin Invasion: Survivor
About the game: Gremlin Invasion: Survivor is a co-op overhead action shooter. With 8 different levels to choose from and up to 8 players, you'll play together in a survival-style mission to blast away hordes of gremlins that have come to take you out. You'll have access only to the weapons and supplies dropped throughout the mission, so use your health and ammo wisely - all you have to do is survive!
